summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Guardian AI application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend pages load correctly with good navigation. Found 2 critical UI interaction issues that need fixing.

ui_bugs.issue: Stripe checkout button clicks but does not redirect to Stripe checkout page
ui_bugs.details: Button is clickable but the checkout flow is not triggering properly. Backend API works but frontend integration may have issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat toggle button is intercepted by Emergent badge overlay, making it unclickable
ui_bugs.details: Emergent badge element is blocking click events on the chat widget toggle button

integration_issues.issue: Frontend checkout button not properly integrated with Stripe redirect

passed_tests: Backend API health check (12/12 endpoints working)
Homepage loads with hero section and services
Service page loads with pricing and features
Contact form submission and success message
Admin dashboard loads with stats and data
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Stripe checkout button integration on service pages - button clicks but doesn't redirect to Stripe. Also fix chat widget accessibility by resolving Emergent badge overlay conflict.
